kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to the given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.19/guides/caps/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | No | alias |

kw.name: Execute Script
kw.doc: Executes a variety of native, mobile commands that aren't associated with a specific endpoint. Check out the appium drivers for more details: https://appium.io/docs/en/2.19/ecosystem/drivers/.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element specified by the ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
